about.text_1: We are group of people who like to play the game of Go. We create the Cracow Go Club and for many years we organize meetings for people who like to play go in good atmosphere.
about.text_2: We create the Cracow Go Club and for many years we organize meetings for people who like to play go in good atmosphere.
about.map_description: Meetings take place on Wednesdays at 6:00 PM in Artefakt Cafe
about.section_1_text: We meet in a place where you can drink good beer and more. There is a garden in the back, where we usually hang out in the summer.
about.section_2_text: Our Club members represent a wide range of skill levels - from beginner DDKs, to internationally-known Dan players like 5 dan Koichiro Habu!
about.section_3_text: You don't need to know how to play the go game to join us. Your curiosity is enough, and we'll teach you everything.
about.section_4_text: Cracow tournaments are great opportunity to meet players from all over Poland and fight for ranking points and prizes.

contact.links_text: You can reach us through the following channels

errors.500_text: An error occurred, please try again later

registration.name: Name
registration.autocomplete_help_text: Type at least 3 characters to search in EGD database
registration.autocomplete_help_popover: Players who played in at least one tournament can search their data in the database to automatically fill in the form. If this is your first tournament, don't worry, you can fill in the form manually.
